__e: He didn't like the story his body told, so he took out my eye with a salad fork.
It was a disposable plastic fork that broke the camel's back and now I feel it is my duty to stop holding back and get real honest with you, Will Schuester.
Do you find it odd that I don't switch my fork when I eat, that I lift it to my mouth with my left hand?
Just don't expect me to be sitting there with a fork and knife next to you.
"No, I'll just fucking cut it with a fork and knife."
This--this may be good enough for someone who wants to drive again, or use a fork and knife in a restaurant, but for what we do, it is not good enough.
"No, I'll just fucking cut it with a fork and knife."
This--this may be good enough for someone who wants to drive again, or use a fork and knife in a restaurant, but for what we do, it is not good enough.
And I knew too, as certainly as I knew that... that he knew - knew it was poisoned, knew that his end was there on that fork... and that he didn't care... that he welcomed it.
I'll toss this fork into the air and wherever it lands, that's what I'll eat. Hiya!
There's a woman with a fork lodged in her chest bleeding to death because she was afraid she'd die waiting for medical attention, so she tried to remove it herself.
They may place a fork on the floor, under the table to see if you notice, and they wouldn't drop it because that could make a noise and make it too easy.
